Text: Great torrent/quality etc, but the top of the video is blue for some reason. Is that just me or is it the video itself?

Osmosian, that happens a lot with these for some reason.  If it bothers you enough, you may want to try other sources, the TV version (which I hate because of all the logos and crap on the screen), or possibly a different player that might have better playback results.  With this one, I would try another source anyway because the file size is just too small and it shows.  Lots of blocking and whatnot.
Nah, it's alright. Was just wondering what's up with the blue. Thanks for the answer!
